channel.title: Help with an update. invisibility cloak! 1 error! i will explain! help!

item.title: Help with an update. invisibility cloak! 1 error! i will explain! help!
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

i’ve added it… its this…

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 2550) { //invisable ring by z range x
    abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
    cba = abc / 10;
    abc2 = cba * 2;
    if (abc2 <= 1) { 
    abc2 = 2;
    }
    playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
    playerLevel[0] += abc2;
    sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4004);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
else {
refreshSkills();
    playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

i changed ring to 2550, which is ring of recoil, and still. doesn’t turn me invisible… =[? no hope??

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @WiZzLe WiZzLe
item.description:
@WiZzLe wrote:

Use this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("invisibility"))
{
   if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 3759) {
      pHead=-100;   
      pTorso=-100;
      pArms=-100;
      pHands=-100;
      pLegs=-100;
      pFeet=-100;
      updateRequired = true; 
      appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
   } 
}
